pineapple(1)
===========

Lib
---
#### pineapple
Pineapple module
```
pineapple
```
See [module](https://github.com/moovatom/pineapple/blob/master/lib/pineapple/README.md)
_____

#### controller
Controller module
```
pineapple.controller
```
See [module](https://github.com/moovatom/pineapple/blob/master/lib/controller/README.md)
_____

Database module
```
pineapple.database
```

_____

```
pineapple.model
```

_____

#### router

```
pineapple.router
```

```
server
```

```
utilities
```
